String.string: Dragon Cube
Combine normal versions of dragons to get a rare version.
Seren's Fusion Altar
Sacrifice various items to receive a random rare item.
Exchange Cube
Insert items from the list below and press Exchange.
Exchanged items are destroyed.
Secret of the Astral Gifts (Event)
Combine the required number of Star Traces together to unlock the secret.
The Star Traces will be converted into a reward.
You can only use Star Traces.
Secret of the Astral Gifts (Event)
Combine the required number of Star Traces together to unlock the secret.
The Star Traces will be converted into a reward.
You can only use Star Traces.
Orb Binder
Enter the required number of orbs.
The orbs disappear when you combine them.
Only orbs of the matching element can be combined.
Card Fusion
Add the required number of identical card fragments to receive a random new fragment.
Fused card fragments are removed from your inventory.
You can only fuse certain card fragments.
Silex Supply
Collect the required materials to earn BP!
Food Supply
Collect the required materials to earn BP!
Plate Supply
Collect the required materials to earn BP!
Underwear Recycling
Break up 3 old sets of underwear to receive Exodor Linen.
The underwear is consumed in the process.
Only underwear from the Goldfinger Tokens laundry basket can be used.
